item.title: Journey to Fluent Japanese (01) - The Start
item.author: Intisar Bin Naim
item.description: Introduction I finally decided to learn Japanese seriously. I used to watch anime a lot, which is how I became interested in the language. My first attempt at learning Japanese was in 2017, six years ago. But I didn’t get very far and eventually gave up after a few days. After my first attempt, I did try three more times to learn the language, but the results were all the same.
